systems.name: ELO & RANK System
systems.description: A system that establishes Elo points alongside a Rank system based on MOBA-style mechanics to increase competitiveness, excitement in climbing ranks, and maintain player engagement in Tank War.
systems.mechanics: Players earn or lose Elo points based on match outcomes. Elo affects rank progression and demotion. Includes season resets and anti-smurfing measures.
systems.objectives: Increase player engagement through competitive ranking, provide clear progression milestones, and ensure fair matchmaking.
interactions: Players interact with the system by playing matches, earning Elo points, and advancing or dropping ranks.
systems.source_note: Section 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 of the provided GDD context.

logic_rules.description: Defines how Elo points are calculated based on match outcomes and rank differences between teams.
logic_rules.trigger: End of a match or disconnection during a match.
logic_rules.effect: Adjusts player's Elo points based on win/loss, disconnect penalties, and rank-based modifiers.
logic_rules.source_note: Section 2.1 and 2.3 of the provided GDD context.

logic_rules.description: Defines conditions for rank advancement, demotion, and seasonal resets.
logic_rules.trigger: Reaching specific Elo thresholds or completing required match outcomes.
logic_rules.effect: Player advances, maintains, or drops ranks based on Elo points and match performance.
logic_rules.source_note: Section 3.2, 3.3, and 3.4 of the provided GDD context.

requirements.title: Implement Elo System
requirements.description: Develop a system to calculate and track player Elo points based on match outcomes.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players gain or lose Elo points correctly based on match results and rank differences.
requirements.source_note: Section 2 of the provided GDD context.

requirements.title: Rank Display in UI
requirements.description: Display current rank and Elo points in the lobby and update them after each match.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Rank and Elo points are visible in the lobby and updated accurately after matches.
requirements.source_note: Section 4 of the provided GDD context.

requirements.title: Seasonal Rank Reset
requirements.description: Implement a soft reset of ranks at the start of each season.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Ranks are reset to a baseline at the start of each season while maintaining some progression.
requirements.source_note: Section 3.4 of the provided GDD context.
